languages.text: {n}Клерк нервно утирает пот со лба.{/n} "Поймите меня правильно, очень тяжело прожить на Футфоле на мое жалованье! А имперское положение сорок три ноль дробь восемь эл "О служителях постмортальных служб на периферийных мирах" прямо запрещает управителю крематория отлучаться с рабочего места иначе чем как для сна, питания, в случае тяжелой болезни и для отправления церковных обетов".

traits.locale_text: {n}Клерк нервно утирает пот со лба.{/n} "Поймите меня правильно, очень тяжело прожить на Футфоле на мое жалованье! А имперское положение сорок три ноль дробь восемь эл "О служителях постмортальных служб на периферийных мирах" прямо запрещает управителю крематория отлучаться с рабочего места иначе чем как для сна, питания и для отправления церковных обетов".
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

languages.text: {n}The clerk wipes the sweat from his brow nervously.{/n} "Please understand, it's very difficult to get by on Footfall with my wages! And Imperial regulation 4030/8L 'On Postmortal Service Workers on Peripheral Worlds' directly prohibits the chief operator of the crematorium from leaving their workplace for any reason other than sleep, food, severe illness, and ministration of sacraments."
languages.original_text: {n}Клерк нервно утирает пот со лба.{/n} "Поймите меня правильно, очень тяжело прожить на Футфоле на мое жалованье! А имперское положение сорок три ноль дробь восемь эл "О служителях постмортальных служб на периферийных мирах" прямо запрещает управителю крематория отлучаться с рабочего места иначе чем как для сна, питания, в случае тяжелой болезни и для отправления церковных обетов".

traits.locale_text: {n}The clerk wipes the sweat from his brow nervously.{/n} "Please understand, it's very difficult to afford a living on Footfall with my wages! And the Imperial regulation four three zero slash eight L 'On Postmortal Service Workers on Peripheral Worlds' directly prohibits the chief operator of the crematorium from leaving their workplace for any reason other than sleep, food, severe illness, and ministration of sacraments."
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

And Imperial regulation 4030/8L 'On Postmortal Service Workers on Peripheral Worlds' directly prohibits the chief operator of the crematorium from leaving their workplace for any reason other than sleep, food, severe illness, and ministration of sacraments."
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

languages.text: {n}这位文员紧张地擦拭着额头上的汗水。{/n}“希望您能理解，以我的工资水平，想在落脚港讨生活真的很难！而帝国律法第4030/8L条《关于边境世界葬仪服务人员的相关规定》中规定，火葬场的首席操作员除了睡觉、吃饭、生了重病，以及举行圣礼之外，严禁以任何理由离开工作场所。”
languages.original_text: {n}The clerk wipes the sweat from his brow nervously.{/n} "Please understand, it's very difficult to get by on Footfall with my wages! And Imperial regulation 4030/8L 'On Postmortal Service Workers on Peripheral Worlds' directly prohibits the chief operator of the crematorium from leaving their workplace for any reason other than sleep, food, severe illness, and ministration of sacraments."

traits.locale_text: {n}这位文员紧张地擦拭着额头上的汗水。{/n}“希望您能理解，以我的工资水平，想在落脚港讨生活真的很难！而帝国律法第4030/8L条《关于边境世界葬仪服务人员的相关规定》中规定，火葬场的首席操作员除了睡觉、吃饭、生了重病，以及举行圣礼之外，严禁以任何理由离开工作场所。”
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

languages.text: {n}El funcionario se seca el sudor de la frente, nervioso.{/n} «Entiéndame, ¡es muy difícil vivir en Paso con mi salario! Y según la normativa Imperial 4030/8L "Sobre el personal de servicio póstumo en mundos periféricos", el principal operador de un crematorio no puede abandonar su puesto de trabajo a excepción de los siguientes motivos: dormir, comer, enfermedad grave o administración de sacramentos».
languages.original_text: {n}The clerk wipes the sweat from his brow nervously.{/n} "Please understand, it's very difficult to get by on Footfall with my wages! And Imperial regulation 4030/8L 'On Postmortal Service Workers on Peripheral Worlds' directly prohibits the chief operator of the crematorium from leaving their workplace for any reason other than sleep, food, severe illness, and ministration of sacraments."

traits.locale_text: {n}El funcionario se seca el sudor de la frente, nervioso.{/n} «Entiéndame, ¡es muy difícil vivir en Paso con mi salario! Y según la normativa Imperial 4030/8L "Sobre el personal de servicio póstumo en mundos periféricos", el principal operador de un crematorio no puede abandonar su puesto de trabajo a excepción de los siguientes motivos: dormir, comer, enfermedad grave o administración de sacramentos».
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

languages.text: {n}職員は額の汗を不安げに拭った。{/n}「私の賃金ではフットフォールでまともに生活できません！しかも帝国規則 4030/8L”周辺惑星の死後奉仕労働者について”において、火葬場の主任技術者が睡眠、食事、重病、聖餐式以外の理由で職場を離れることを禁じられているんです」
languages.original_text: {n}The clerk wipes the sweat from his brow nervously.{/n} "Please understand, it's very difficult to get by on Footfall with my wages! And Imperial regulation 4030/8L 'On Postmortal Service Workers on Peripheral Worlds' directly prohibits the chief operator of the crematorium from leaving their workplace for any reason other than sleep, food, severe illness, and ministration of sacraments."

traits.locale_text: {n}職員は額の汗を不安げに拭った。{/n}「私の賃金ではフットフォールでまともに生活できません！しかも帝国規則 4030/8L”周辺惑星の死後奉仕労働者について”において、火葬場の主任技術者が睡眠、食事、重病、聖餐式以外の理由で職場を離れることを禁じられているんです」
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

languages.text: {n}Der Angestellte wischt sich nervös den Schweiß von der Stirn.{/n} "Versteht bitte, dass es bei meinem Gehalt sehr schwierig ist, auf Footfall über die Runden zu kommen! Und die imperiale Vorschrift 4030/8L für 'postmortale Servicemitarbeiter auf Randwelten' verbietet dem Leiter des Krematoriums ausdrücklich, seinen Arbeitsplatz zu verlassen, außer zur Nachtruhe, Nahrungsaufnahme, bei schwerer Krankheit und zur Verabreichung von Sakramenten."
languages.original_text: {n}The clerk wipes the sweat from his brow nervously.{/n} "Please understand, it's very difficult to get by on Footfall with my wages! And Imperial regulation 4030/8L 'On Postmortal Service Workers on Peripheral Worlds' directly prohibits the chief operator of the crematorium from leaving their workplace for any reason other than sleep, food, severe illness, and ministration of sacraments."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Angestellte wischt sich nervös den Schweiß von der Stirn.{/n} "Versteht bitte, dass es bei meinem Gehalt sehr schwierig ist, auf Footfall über die Runden zu kommen! Und die imperiale Vorschrift 4030/8L für 'postmortale Servicemitarbeiter auf Randwelten' verbietet dem Leiter des Krematoriums ausdrücklich, seinen Arbeitsplatz zu verlassen, außer zur Nachtruhe, Nahrungsaufnahme, bei schwerer Krankheit und zur Verabreichung von Sakramenten."
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

languages.text: {n}D'un geste nerveux, le greffier essuie la sueur qui lui goutte du front.{/n} « Je vous en prie, vous devez me comprendre ! Mes gages me permettent à peine de joindre les deux bouts à Castel ! Et la réglementation 4030/8L de l'Imperium concernant les "Fournisseurs de services funéraires sur les mondes périphériques" interdit aux chefs opérateurs des crématoriums de quitter leur lieu de travail, sauf pour dormir et se nourrir, ou en cas de maladie grave ou de célébration de sacrements. »
languages.original_text: {n}The clerk wipes the sweat from his brow nervously.{/n} "Please understand, it's very difficult to get by on Footfall with my wages! And Imperial regulation 4030/8L 'On Postmortal Service Workers on Peripheral Worlds' directly prohibits the chief operator of the crematorium from leaving their workplace for any reason other than sleep, food, severe illness, and ministration of sacraments."

traits.locale_text: {n}D'un geste nerveux, le greffier essuie la sueur qui lui goutte du front.{/n} « Je vous en prie, vous devez me comprendre ! Mes gages me permettent à peine de joindre les deux bouts à Castel ! Et la réglementation 4030/8L de l'Imperium concernant les "Fournisseurs de services funéraires sur les mondes périphériques" interdit aux chefs opérateurs des crématoriums de quitter leur lieu de travail, sauf pour dormir et se nourrir, ou en cas de maladie grave ou de célébration de sacrements. »
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

languages.text: {n}Kâtip, alnında biriken teri gergince siliyor.{/n} "Lütfen beni anlayın, maaşımla Binliman'da geçinmek çok zor! 4030/8L sayılı 'Çevre Dünyalardaki Ölüm Sonrası Hizmet Çalışanları' İmparatorluk yönetmeliği de krematoryum başoperatörünün uyku, yemek, ciddi hastalık ve dinî törenlerin idaresi dışındaki sebeplerle iş yerini terk etmesini yasaklar."
languages.original_text: {n}The clerk wipes the sweat from his brow nervously.{/n} "Please understand, it's very difficult to get by on Footfall with my wages! And Imperial regulation 4030/8L 'On Postmortal Service Workers on Peripheral Worlds' directly prohibits the chief operator of the crematorium from leaving their workplace for any reason other than sleep, food, severe illness, and ministration of sacraments."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kâtip, kaşlarında biriken teri gergince siliyor.{/n} "Lütfen beni anlayın, maaşımla Binliman'da geçinmek çok zor! 4030/8L sayılı 'Dış Dünyalardaki Ölüm Sonrası Hizmet Çalışanları' İmparatorluk yönetmeliği, krematoryum baş operatörünün uyku, yemek, ciddi hastalık ve dinî vazifeler dışındaki sebepler dolayısıyla iş yerlerini terk etmesini yasaklıyor."
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1
